pullrequest.title: Model submission for X1 sensor configuration 6.

content.raw: Should we use a PointCloud messages for cliff sensors? I say this because some of the cliff sensors I've seen act more like depth cameras with (eg. Evo 64px http://wiki.ros.org/teraranger). Point cloud messages would make a more consistent interface for single pixel and multi-pixel sensors.
content.html: Should we use a PointCloud messages for cliff sensors? I say this because some of the cliff sensors I've seen act more like depth cameras with (eg. Evo 64px http://wiki.ros.org/teraranger). Point cloud messages would make a more consistent interface for single pixel and multi-pixel sensors.
